T02D2891:241b-0: @241b * // rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor bzhugs /
T02D2891:241b-2: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje wal gyis bsgoms la lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2891:241b-3: de nas aom sva bh'a ba shuddha:sarba dharm'a:sv'a bh'a ba
T02D2891:241b-4: shuddhonya\ham zhes brjod pas chu gtor gyi snod de stong
T02D2891:241b-5: par bsams la / stong pa'i ngang las bhr'um ser
T02D2891:241b-6: po las gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i khang bu
T02D2891:241b-7: par bsams la / brtsegs pa / ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi tshad tsam du bsams te /
T02D2891:241b-8: de'i nang du gtor ma yi ge kham ljang gu las kha zas ro brgya pa /
T02D2891:241b-9: nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam pa bsams te /
T02D2891:241b-11: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D2891:241b-12: a'adya nutpanna tv'a ta aom a'a:h'um zhes 'jig rten pa'i bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2891:241b-13: aom a'a: h'um gsum gyis byin gyis brlab /
T02D2891:241b-14: ye shes kyi bdud rtsir byin gyis brlab pa ni /
T02D2891:241b-15: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa na sarba aartha s'a dha na ye sv'ah'a /
T02D2891:241b-16: zhes bya ba sangs rgyas spyan gyis sngags dang /
T02D2891:241b-17: nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags kyis spel ba ni /
T02D2891:241b-18: aom na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo /
T02D2891:241b-19: bi shva mu khe bhya: sarba th'a kham autga te
T02D2891:241b-20: spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'ah'a
T02D2891:241b-22: rang gi sa bon las 'od 'phros pas nam mkha'i
T02D2891:241b-23: khams su hr'i: las padma dpag tu med pa bsams
T02D2891:241b-24: te / de'i steng du yi dam lha la sogs pa 'gro drug thams cad spyan drangs la //
T02D2891:241b-25: de rnams la yang 'od phogs pas sdig sgrib dag nas yi dam gyi lhar byas la /
T02D2891:241b-26: bdun rnam dag byas la bgegs bskrad pa ni aom
T02D2891:241b-27: badzra p'a ni aa mri te kunda li ha na
T02D2891:241b-28: ha na h'um phat ces bya'o //
T02D2891:241b-29: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni
T02D2891:241b-30: a'a dzny'a pa ya ti ai dam ba lim grihnam
T02D2891:241b-32: raksham tu ma ma sarba siddham me pra yatstshantu ma ma sarba karma s'a du sv'ah'a /
T02D2891:241b-33: zhes pas yi dam rnams la dbul /
T02D2891:242a-0: @242a * // mgron gzhan rnams la yang sbyin pa na /
T02D2891:242a-1: na ma ssarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo
T02D2891:242a-2: ki te aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um
T02D2891:242a-3: zhes brjod pas byin gyis rlabs kyis phan tshun zhe
T02D2891:242a-5: 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par byas nas sngags 'dis yid la ci 'dod pa dang /
T02D2891:242a-6: mig sngar ci mdzes pa mngon par dga' ba dang ;
T02D2891:242a-7: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2891:242a-8: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddhe lo tsa na sarba aartha s'a dha na ya sv'ah'a /
T02D2891:242a-9: sngags 'di gnyis lan bdun bdun du brjod do //
T02D2891:242a-10: de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa'o //
T02D2891:242a-11: chos kyi sbyin pa ni rten 'brel snying po dang //
T02D2891:242a-13: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
T02D2891:242a-14: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D2891:242a-15: de la 'gog pa gang yin pa //
T02D2891:242a-16: dge sbyong chen pos 'di skad gsungs //
T02D2891:242a-17: sdig pa ci yang mi bgyi ste //
T02D2891:242a-18: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
T02D2891:242a-19: rang gi sems ni yongs su dul //
T02D2891:242a-20: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
T02D2891:242a-22: de nas smon lam gdab pa ni /
T02D2891:242a-23: dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun //
T02D2891:242a-24: bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te //
T02D2891:242a-25: bsod nams ye shes las byung ba'i //
T02D2891:242a-26: dam pa nyid ni thob par shog / ces pa'o //
T02D2891:242a-27: de nas bden pa bdar ba ni /
T02D2891:242a-28: sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /
T02D2891:242a-34: bdag gi bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i stobs kyis
T02D2891:242a-35: sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa thams cad zhi
T02D2891:242a-36: nas bar chad dang gnod pa thams cad spangs te
T02D2891:242a-37: byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig / bdag
T02D2891:242a-38: gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis //
T02D2891:242a-39: klu rnams gnod pa myur du zhi ba dang //
T02D2891:242a-40: bgegs dang log 'dren 'tshe ba med pa dang //
T02D2891:242a-41: bdag gi las rnams thams cad 'grub par mdzod //
T02D2891:242a-42: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa brjod la /
T02D2891:242a-43: badzra mu: zhes pas so sor rang gi gnas su gshegs par bya'o //
T02D2891:242a-44: rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi chu gtor gyi
T02D2891:242a-45: cho ga slob dpon 'gro ba zangs snying pos mdzad
T02D2891:242a-47: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta te dza de ba dang /
